name: Dice Physics (itch)
description:
Do you need Dice for a Game? Do you need 1 Die? 2 Dice? How About 10 Dice? This Game (that was Made on Jan.29, 2018) is a Dice Game for Throwing Dice for a Simulation! Hit SPACE to Toss the Dice and Use the Left and Right Arrow Keys to Change the Amount of Dice you want!

Instructions:

If you have Luck with you, hit "G" on the Keyboard to Play my Made-Up Game! (hit "C" to go Back to "Classic Mode")

"Gamble Mode" is all about Luck! When you Start this mode, you get 3 Dice and you'll get a Number for the Total! Now, is the Next Roll gonna be Higher or Lower than the Total of the Last Roll? Make your Choice by hitting the Left and Right Arrow Keys! If the Roll is Correct on your Bid, you'll get +1 Die and Points! If the Roll is Incorrect on your Bid, you'll get -1 Die and Lose Points! If the Roll is the SAME NUMBER from the Total on the Last Roll, you'll get +3 Dice and Big Points! But, If a Die Lands in a way where it's a Unreadable State, BAD ROLL, you'll Lose 3 Dice and a Big Amount of your Points! Good Luck and Don't Lose ALL of your Dice, because it will End in a Game Over! Try to Get a High Score!!! ENJOY!
